summary:
Recently moved to the Netherlands and am able to work remotely effectively. 

Formerly team lead/senior manager in a Singapore food safety agency.I have more than 10 years of experience in food safety risk management framework, as well as legal and health requirements programmes in fresh and processed food.  Internationally oriented and minded, I have a proven ability and track record to establish a professional and mutual working relationship with external stakeholders, such as traders and overseas government bodies.

I love learning new things and meeting people, with a strong focus on building trust and genuine relationships with all. I am also an avid traveler and nature enthusiast, always open to different cultures and expanding my horizon.

education.degree_name: Integrated Pest Management and Food Safety Training Program

awards.title: Sheares Meritorious Award - Gold Award
awards.issuer: Sheares Hall, National University of Singapore

profile_positions.description:
Following the restructuring of the organization, I progressed to the senior manager/assistant director role at HQ office, which functions as a pivotal role in reporting, coordinating, and supporting the operational and administrative needs of a new food safety compliance department of 150 staff members operating at 4 office locations. 
Key achievements:
- In-charged of food recall and food incident operations. Nationwide food recalls involving food manufacturers, inspection operation teams, and communication/customer service teams were promptly initiated and coordinated. 
- Ensured science-based risk assessments with experts’ advice, onsite inspections, documentation checks, and verifications were conducted thoroughly and swiftly, overseeing the appropriate level of corrective actions were taken to minimize food safety risk to end consumers, and to avoid similar incidents from happening again.
- Participated in the project team to develop dashboards using data-analytic tools for traceability and coordination of food recall operations.  
- Managed Customer Service Platform and ensured incoming inquiries from members of the public and stakeholders were responded to promptly, ensuring fast resolutions of issues.
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager (Operation Management)

profile_positions.description:
I managed a team of 12 members to implement and carry out food safety inspection operations on imported food products. I was also responsible to maintain strong communication and cooperation with industry stakeholders, balancing food security and safety compliance.

Key achievements:

- Assisted the Deputy Director of Import Inspection division to ensure a high level of professionalism and excellent customer service delivery of food safety inspection operations. 
- Planned, executed, and monitored food safety regulatory and inspection programmes on imported food, including fresh fruit and vegetable, processed food, dairy products and food packaging material. 
- Conducted audits on Good Manufacturing Practices certification programme for minimally processed/ ready-to-eat food products.
- Participated in the development and implementation of a new in-house inspection and monitoring system using mobile devices. The new electronic system was implemented successfully, supporting an annual turnover of at least 40,000 food safety inspections conducted on imported food. 
- Prepared, monitored, and reviewed operation resources such as budget and manpower.
- Maintained the inspection database systematically to generate quick and reliable statistical reports as and when required.
- Participated in business process re-engineering (BPR) project on inspection operations procedures. Cost-saving was achieved and productivity was improved as non-value-added steps and processes were eliminated.
- Planned, organized, and carried out stakeholder engagement and dialogue sessions. Researched and prepared talking points, insights, and updates for meaningful discussions and outcomes.
profile_positions.title: Compliance and Inspection Operations Team Lead (Import & Export, Food)

profile_positions.description:
Key achievements: 
- As the lead auditor, carried out desk and field audits, samplings of products and spot checks on horticulture farms for Good Agricultural Practices certification scheme. 
- Conducted food safety compliance inspections such as import documentation, health certificates, labeling, and quality checks on imported food products, samplings, and detention of goods were also being conducted according to the operating procedures.
- In-charged and supervised the inspections on vegetable farms and plant nurseries for food safety and pesticide compliance. 
- Participated in the risk assessment of crop protection chemicals for registration (pesticide registration).
- Conducted thorough investigations on non-compliances and irregularities discovered during compliance checks, and followed up with appropriate enforcement actions.
- Maintained accurate daily inspection database. 
- Responded to public inquiries, and assisted traders in applying for licenses and trading permits to import food into Singapore, processed and evaluated applications promptly and accurately.
profile_positions.title: Food Safety and Inspection Regulatory Officer
